categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Close-Shave" was the nickname of a Galactic Republic clone trooper living during the Clone Wars. A clone of the Human male bounty hunter Jango Fett, Close-Shave was born on the planet Kamino, and stood 1.83 meters fully-grown. In 22 BBY, he served in the Mission to Kynachi with a squad of troopers which received the moniker of Breakout Squad.
Close-Shave appears in Ryder Windham's young readers novel, The Clone Wars: Secret Missions 1: Breakout Squad.
